TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StatisticFormula extends System.Object

summary.span: 計算統計公式。

span.span: Calculates statistical formulas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公式可以鬆散分為下列類別： 散發套件，包括反向的散發套件;測試;和基本統計公式。Formulas can be loosely grouped into the following categories: distributions, including inverse distributions; tests; and basic statistical formulas. 每個群組有共同的特性，相對於其輸入和傳回值。Each group has common characteristics with respect to their input and return values.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnovaResult Anova (double probability, string inputSeriesNames);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnovaResult Anova(float64 probability, string inputSeriesNames) cil managed
Public Function Anova (probability As Double, inputSeriesNames As String) As AnovaResult
public: System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::AnovaResult ^ Anova(double probability, System::String ^ inputSeriesNames);
member this.Anova : double * string -> System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnovaResult

param.name: probability
param.span: Alpha 值。

span.span: Alpha value.

param.span: 可接受的輸入範圍介於 0 和 1 之間。

span.span: The acceptable input range is between 0 and 1.

param.name: inputSeriesNames
param.span: 兩個以上輸入數列的名稱。

span.span: Names of two or more input series.

param.span: 在呼叫方法的同時，每個數列都必須在數列集合中，而且必須有相同數目的資料點。

span.span: Each series must exist in the series collection at the time of the method call, and have the same number of data points.

summary.span: Anova 公式會判斷兩個以上資料群組的平均值之間是否存在統計上的顯著差異。

span.span: The Anova formula determines the existence or absence of a statistically significant difference between the mean values of two or more groups of data.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何使用此公式。The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As AnovaResult = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Anova(.05, "Series1,Series2,Series3") ``` ```csharp AnovaResult result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Anova(.05, "Series1,Series2,Series3"); ```

Public Function BetaFunction (m As Double, n As Double) As Double
public: double BetaFunction(double m, double n);
member this.BetaFunction : double * double -> double

param.name: m
param.span: Beta 函式的第一個值。

span.span: First value for the beta function.

param.name: n
param.span: Beta 函式的第二個值。

span.span: Second value for the beta function.

summary.span: Beta 函式會計算 Beta 函式值。

span.span: The beta function calculates the beta function value.
Beta value.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何使用此公式。The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As Double = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.BetaFunction(2.3, 6.2) ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.BetaFunction(2.3, 6.2); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public double Correlation (string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName);
.method public hidebysig instance float64 Correlation(string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName) cil managed
Public Function Correlation (firstInputSeriesName As String, secondInputSeriesName As String) As Double
public: double Correlation(System::String ^ firstInputSeriesName, System::String ^ secondInputSeriesName);
member this.Correlation : string * string -> double

param.name: firstInputSeriesName
param.span: 物件的名稱，這個物件會儲存第一個群組的資料。

span.span: Name of the object that stores the first group's data.

param.name: secondInputSeriesName
param.span: 物件的名稱，這個物件會儲存第二個群組的資料。

span.span: Name of the object that stores the second group's data.

summary.span: 相互關聯公式會顯示兩個隨機變數之間存在的關聯性強度。

span.span: The correlation formula shows the strength of the relationship that exists between two random variables.

returns.span: 兩個資料群組間的相互關聯值。

span.span: Correlation value between the two groups of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果輸入的數列沒有相同數目的資料點，則方法會擲回例外狀況。The method throws an exception if the input series do not have the same number of data points. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何使用此公式。The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As Double = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Correlation("Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Correlation("Series1", "Series2"); ```

param.name: secondInputSeriesName
param.span: 物件的名稱，這個物件會儲存第二個群組的資料。

span.span: Name of the object that stores the second group's data.

summary.span: 共異變數公式會計算兩個隨機變數之間可能存在的相依程度。

span.span: The covariance formula measures the degree of dependence that may exist between two random variables.

returns.span: 兩個資料群組間的共異變數值。

span.span: Covariance value between the two groups of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果輸入的數列沒有相同數目的資料點，則方法會擲回例外狀況。The method throws an exception if the input series do not have the same number of data points. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何使用此公式。The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As double = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Covariance("Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Covariance("Series1", "Series2"); ```

summary.span: F 測試公式會使用 F 分佈來執行雙樣本 F 測試，用於確定樣本是否有不同的變異數。

span.span: The F-test formula performs a two-sample F-test using F distribution, and is used to see if the samples have different variances.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果輸入的數列沒有相同數目的資料點，則方法會擲回例外狀況。The method throws an exception if the input series do not have the same number of data points. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何使用此公式。The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As FTestResult = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.FTest(0.05, "Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp FTestResult result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.FTest(0.05, "Series1", "Series2"); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public double InverseNormalDistribution (double probability);
.method public hidebysig instance float64 InverseNormalDistribution(float64 probability) cil managed
Public Function InverseNormalDistribution (probability As Double) As Double
public: double InverseNormalDistribution(double probability);
member this.InverseNormalDistribution : double -> double

param.name: probability
param.span: Alpha 值。

span.span: Alpha value.

param.span: 可接受的輸入範圍介於 0 和 1 之間。

span.span: The acceptable input range is between 0 and 1.

summary.span: 反向常態分佈公式會計算標準常態累計分佈的相反值。

span.span: The inverse normal distribution formula calculates the inverse of the standard normal cumulative distribution.

summary.span: 分佈的平均值為 0，而其標準差則為 1。

span.span: The distribution has a mean of 0 and a standard deviation of one.

returns.span: 常態分佈函式的相反值。

span.span: Inverse of the normal distribution function.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何使用此公式。The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As double = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.InverseNormalDistribution(.05) ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.InverseNormalDistribution(.05); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public double InverseTDistribution (double probability, int degreeOfFreedom);
.method public hidebysig instance float64 InverseTDistribution(float64 probability, int32 degreeOfFreedom) cil managed
Public Function InverseTDistribution (probability As Double, degreeOfFreedom As Integer) As Double
public: double InverseTDistribution(double probability, int degreeOfFreedom);
member this.InverseTDistribution : double * int -> double

param.name: probability
param.span: F 分佈的機率。

span.span: Probability for the F distribution.

param.span: 可接受的範圍介於 0 和 1 之間。

span.span: The acceptable range is between 0 and 1.

param.name: degreeOfFreedom
param.span: 自由度。

span.span: Degree of freedom.

summary.span: 反向 *t* 分佈公式會將學生之 *t* 分佈的 *t* 值，計算為機率和自由度的函數。

span.span: The inverse *t*-distribution formula calculates the *t*-value of the Student's *t*-distribution as a function of probability and degrees of freedom.
Inverse of the *t*-distribution.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何使用此公式。The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.InverseTDistribution(.05, 15) ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.InverseTDistribution(.05, 15); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.TTestResult TTestEqualVariances (double hypothesizedMeanDifference, double probability, string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName);

param.name: hypothesizedMeanDifference
param.span: 資料群組的假設平均差。

span.span: Hypothesized difference between the means of the data groups.

param.name: probability
param.span: Alpha 值。

span.span: Alpha value.

param.span: 可接受的範圍介於 0 和 1 之間。

span.span: The acceptable range is between 0 and 1.

param.name: firstInputSeriesName
param.span: 物件的名稱，這個物件會儲存第一個群組的資料。

summary.span: 具有相等變異數的 *t* 測試公式會使用學生具有相等變異數的 *t* 分佈來執行 *t* 測試。

span.span: The *t*-test with equal variances formula performs a *t*-test using Student's *t*-distribution with equal variances.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何使用此公式。The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As TTestResult = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.TTestPaired(0.2, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp TTestResult result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.TTestPaired(0.2, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2"); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.TTestResult TTestPaired (double hypothesizedMeanDifference, double probability, string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.TTestResult TTestPaired(float64 hypothesizedMeanDifference, float64 probability, string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName) cil managed
Public Function TTestPaired (hypothesizedMeanDifference As Double, probability As Double, firstInputSeriesName As String, secondInputSeriesName As String) As TTestResult

public: System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::TTestResult ^ TTestPaired(double hypothesizedMeanDifference, double probability, System::String ^ firstInputSeriesName, System::String ^ secondInputSeriesName);
member this.TTestPaired : double * double * string * string -> System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.TTestResult

param.name: hypothesizedMeanDifference
param.span: 資料群組的假設平均差。

span.span: Hypothesized difference between the means of the data groups.

param.name: probability
param.span: Alpha 值。

span.span: Alpha value.

param.span: 可接受的範圍介於 0 和 1 之間。

span.span: The acceptable range is between 0 and 1.

param.name: firstInputSeriesName
param.span: 物件的名稱，這個物件會儲存第一個群組的資料。

span.span: Name of the object that stores the first group's data.

param.name: secondInputSeriesName
param.span: 物件的名稱，這個物件會儲存第二個群組的資料。

span.span: Name of the object that stores the second group's data.

summary.span: *t* 測試配對公式會使用學生具有配對樣本的 *t* 分佈來執行 *t* 測試。

span.span: The *t*-test paired formula performs a *t*-test using Student's *t*-distribution with paired samples.

summary.span: 在樣本中觀察到自然配對時 (例如樣本群組已測試兩次時)，便可使用這個公式。

span.span: This is useful when there is an observed natural pairing in samples (for example, when a sample group is tested twice).
A object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何使用此公式。The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As TTestResult = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.TTestPaired(0.2, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp TTestResult result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.TTestPaired(0.2, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2"); ```

param.span: Alpha 值。

span.span: Alpha value.

param.span: 可接受的範圍介於 0 和 1 之間。

span.span: The acceptable range is between 0 and 1.

param.name: firstInputSeriesName
param.span: 物件的名稱，這個物件會儲存第一個群組的資料。

span.span: Name of the object that stores the first group's data.

param.name: secondInputSeriesName
param.span: 物件的名稱，這個物件會儲存第二個群組的資料。

span.span: Name of the object that stores the second group's data.

summary.span: 具有不相等變異數的 *t* 測試公式會使用學生具有不相等變異數的 *t* 分佈來執行 *t* 測試。

span.span: The *t*-test with unequal variances formula performs a *t*-test using Student's *t*-distribution with unequal variances.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何使用此公式。The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As TTestResult = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.TTestUnEqualVariances(0.2, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp TTestResult result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.TTestUnEqualVariances(0.2, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2"); ```

A object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何使用此公式。The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As ZTestResult = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.ZTest(0.2, 2.5, 4.5, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp ZTestResult result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.ZTest(0.2, 2.5, 4.5, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2"); ```
